 2005-20392005-11-21,  HERITAGE,  PSC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisPUBLIC SERVICE OFFICIAL LANGUAGES APPOINTMENT REGULATIONS - which allow for the appointment - under specific conditions - of persons who are proficient in only one official language to certain bilingual positions within the federal public service.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2005-0347 Publication Date: 2005-12-14
